casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lloyd Douglas MOSS. No. 617P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Alvin W. Keller, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of December 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
